sentence.Network_en: The silver medallist joined the winner in a lap of honour.
sentence.Network_cn: 银牌和金牌得主一起绕场一周.

sentence.Network_en: He became Jamaica's first Olympic gold medallist when he won the 400m title in 1948.
sentence.Network_cn: 他1948年赢得400米冠军，成为牙买加第一位奥运会金牌得主。

sentence.Network_en: After that season I was double World Champion and Olympic silver medallist.
sentence.Network_cn: 而在那个赛季之后我已经是2届世界冠军和奥运亚军.

entry.tran: (体育比赛中的)奖章获得者，奖牌获得者
entry.def: A medallist is a person who has won a medal in sport.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who has won a medal
2. (golf) the winner at medal play of a tournament
